pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pytrainer is a tool to log all your sport excursion coming from GPS devices (with a focus on ForeRunner 205, 305 and 405) or GPX (http://www.topografix.com) files. Pytrainer supports GPS track files and displays it in graphs, maps...

use.flag: Enable importing from standard GPS formats
Support fixing elevation data using SRTM data
